problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, point P is a point on the diagonal AC of the rectangle ABCD, and cross point P as EF ∥ BC, cross AB, CD to E and F respectively, and connect PB and PD. If AE = N_0, PF = N_1. Then the area of the shaded part in the figure is ()
raw_answer: 作PM⊥AD于M,交BC于N.则有四边形AEPM,四边形DFPM,四边形CFPN,四边形BEPN都是矩形,S_{△ADC}=S_{△ABC},S_{△AMP}=S_{△AEP},S_{△PFC}=S_{△PCN}∴S_{矩形EBNP}=S_{矩形MPFD},又∵S_{△PBE}=\frac{1}{2}S_{矩形EBNP},S_{△PFD}=\frac{1}{2}S_{矩形MPFD}∴S_{△DFP}=S_{△PBE}=\frac{1}{2}×2×8=8∴S_{阴}=8+8=16,故选C.
raw_comment: 本题考查矩形的性质、三角形的面积等知识,解题的关键是证明S_{△PEB}=S_{△PFD}.
